fixes_made.desc: Missing cross-reference to overflow error documentation
changes: Added error code references (Error 6 - OV) to INTEGER and DOUBLE overflow examples
Clarified that underflow produces no error (just becomes 0)

fixes_made.desc: Variables Window keyboard shortcut missing in quick-reference
changes: Updated quick-reference.md to use {{kbd:toggle_variables:curses}} instead of "Menu only"
Updated feature-reference.md to document Ctrl+W keyboard shortcut
Added menu path as alternative (Ctrl+U → Debug → Variables)

fixes_made.desc: Renumber keyboard shortcut missing in quick-reference
changes: Updated quick-reference.md to use {{kbd:renumber:curses}} instead of "Menu only"
Now consistent with feature-reference.md which documents Ctrl+E
Updated quick-reference.md to use {{kbd:settings:curses}} instead of "Menu only"
Updated feature-reference.md to document Ctrl+P keyboard shortcut
Added menu path as alternative (Ctrl+U → File → Settings)

verified_correct.reason: Already documented legacy localhost:8000 vs /mbasic_docs paths
Precision wording is consistent (~7 vs approximately 7 digits)
Error code reference format is consistent
LOF function is properly listed in index
END does reference STOP, and stop.md exists
CLS implementation properly clarified (basic CLS implemented, not GW-BASIC extended version)
LPRINT clearly documented as parsed but no output
GET/PUT properly distinguished (file I/O implemented, graphics not applicable)
Execution Stack correctly documented as menu-only (no keyboard shortcut)
FIX/INT circular reference is educational (explaining relationship), not problematic
